ing.item: Apples Grand smith; Pare, core, and slice thin, (up to 4)

directions.step:
Source: From my mother with love & more. Family recipe.
Place 1/2 of the apples in greased baking dish. Sprinkle with 1/2 sugar and nutmeg. Dot with 1/2 the butter. Add 1/2 the bread crumbs and cranberries. Repeat: Ending with the crumbs. Dot with the butter and bake in pre heated 350F hot oven for 1 hour.
Serve hot with Lemon Pudding.
